Method Detail

parseLong

public static long parseLong(java.lang.String string,
                             long defaultValue)
Convert a String to a long if possible. Instead of throwing an exception like Long.parseLong() does, return a specified default long value if an error is encountered.

Parameters:
string - String to be parsed
defaultValue - default value to be returned if a parse error
Returns:
parsed long value

parseLong

public static long parseLong(java.lang.String string)
Convert a String to a long if possible. Instead of throwing an exception like Long.parseLong() does, return 0 if an error is encountered.

Parameters:
string - String to be parsed
Returns:
parsed long value

                               float defaultValue)
Convert a String to a float if possible. Instead of throwing an exception like Float.parseFloat() does, return a specified default value if an error is encountered

Parameters:

defaultValue - default value to be returned if a parse error
Returns:
parsed float value

parseFloat

Convert a String to a float if possible. Instead of throwing an exception like Float.parseFloat() does, return 0 if an error is encountered

Returns:
parsed float value

parseSizeString

public static long parseSizeString(java.lang.String string)
Box API sometimes returns sizes as just the number of bytes, and sometimes returns sizes as strings like "7.4KB". This normalizes to a number of bytes.

Parameters:
string - The size string from Box API
Returns:
the equivalent number of bytes.
